```{r}
#| echo: false

library(googlesheets4)
library(gt)
library(tidyverse)
gs4_deauth()
d <- read_sheet("https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1LC5js3a9r0uurbfRcplwlhzd069myzJW0Fj0RoCrwXA/edit?usp=sharing")


```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false

d |>
  select(-dia) |>
  mutate(
    fecha = as.Date(fecha)
  ) |>
  gt() |>
  fmt_date(fecha, 
           date_style = 31,
            locale = 'es-VE') |>
  sub_missing(columns = c(semana, tema, materiales), missing_text = "") |>
  cols_align(
    align = "center",
    columns = c(semana)
    ) |>
  cols_align(
    align = "right",
    columns = c(fecha)
    ) |>
  cols_align(
    align = "left",
    columns = c(tema, materiales)
    ) |>
  tab_style(
    style = cell_borders(
      sides = "right",
      color = "#D3D3D3",
      style = "solid"
    ),
    locations = cells_body(
      columns = c(fecha, tema, materiales)
    )
  ) |>
  fmt_markdown(
    columns = c(tema, materiales)
  ) |>
  cols_width(
    semana ~ px(45),
    fecha ~ px(100),
    tema ~ px(200),
    materiales ~ px(600)
  ) |>
  cols_label_with(fn = function(x) {
      janitor::make_clean_names(x, case = "title") |>
        toupper() |>
        stringr::str_replace_all("^|$", "**") |>
        md()
    }) |>
  tab_options(table.font.size = 13) |>
  opt_row_striping()
```
